summary:
​​fields of expertise : 
Product development, Business Strategy |  New Features & Apps |
​​challenger, strateeg en doener

I​​k ben een ondernemende teamplayer met veel ervaring in het opzetten/starten van nieuwe producten. Met veel plezier heb ik eerst 5 jaar festivals georganiseerd, om vervolgens de laatste 10 jaar aan verschillende digitale producten te hebben gewerkt. De belangrijkste tip, die ik meegekreeg, is dat alles een logistiek proces is. De uitdaging is om een naadloos proces te creëren, die rekening houdt met steeds veranderende omstandigheden en frictieloos alle stakeholders de gewenste informatie aandraagt voor de meest optimale productbeleving. Heldere communicatie, doorgrondelijke navigatie en toegevoegde waarde zijn de kern ingrediënten voor elke succes. Ik zet mijn creativiteit, oplossingsgericht- en servicegerichtheid in om dit te bereiken.

Als (New) Business Prototyper zorg ik ervoor dat met minimale inspanning en budgetten, het concept in een korte periode in de markt wordt gezet.Met behulp van een Proof of Concept of Minimal Viable Product kan snel ingespeeld worden feedback van de gebruiker en heldere keuzes worden gemaakt hoe door te ontwikkelen tot een volledig product.

Als Strategy & Business Developer streef ik ernaar om op basis van het huidige product de bestaande markten en doelgroepen verder te bedienen en/of nieuwe markten en doelgroepen te definiëren. Hierbij ben ik kritisch, breng ik het product terug tot zijn essentie en vraag ik mezelf steeds af hoe kan het product, nog meer, waarde toevoegen voor een gebruiker en het bedrijf.

Als Product Owner staat bij mij voorop het managen van de verschillende verwachtingen van alle stakeholders. Business, techniek en consumentengedrag kunnen haaks op elkaar staan. Met mijn marketingachtergrond en mijn ervaring, weet ik hoe cruciaal het is in te springen op de veranderende wensen van een consument en rekening te houden met aspecten die niet direct met de development te maken hebben, maar wel essentieel zijn voor het succes van het totale bedrijf.

treasury_media.title: heythis.is app
treasury_media.description: heythis.is is your personal assistent, collecting social media content & publishing all your work in one easy to read overview. The key features are content aggregation, automated content checks for new updates, content publishing & content sharing. projects.title: beatmeat.org
projects.description:
Beatmeat.org is for people that support the idea that a little less buying, consuming and eating is an essential factor in bettering the environment. When it comes to eating less, less meat has an instant positive effect on cutting emissions and indirectly to decreasing land and water usage. Skipping 20% daily, ends up saving 215kg of emissions yearly, but also frees up 2,300 m2 of land and tons of water.  

Beatmeat.org challenges us to achieve a balance between the the carbon we produce against the carbon we save. A balance we can only achieve when we balance our consumption as a group. So all flexitarians, vegetarians, vegans and environmentally aware meat eaters, are welkom to join, show their support and contribute to the balance. 

Beatmeat.org represents one united front of people, institutions & companies working on a common goal: balancing consumption, balancing world of people, governments, companies and mother nature.

Business prototyping method:
1. Proof of Concept : Very there is a market.
2. Build MVP : Simple community with profiles, share info boards and more advanced calculator.
3. Build challenges
4. Build native.app
5. Expand to other areas of intrest.

projects.title: heythis.is your tool for more effective, simpler and better online branding..
projects.description:
heythis.is is a new tool that simplifies managing your online presence. heythis.is provides services to ease up digital online branding. Adding value to any professionals and/or groups that use online channels to broadcast and promote their passions, products, services and/or personalities. 

Individuals spend less time connecting channels, managing all content and building a complete overview of all their work. Groups benefit by bundling their shared goals to increase the online visibility and findability of all members and participants.

We believe that we will achieve this by effectively bundling all online content in one overview, websites and (mini)portals. By adding automation, updating all social networks and websites becomes less cumbersome and more efficient. This being the key to having great self sufficient and value adding online presence. 

We build our tool to serve professionals, groups, genres, networks, companies and cities. Join forces, our goals will benefit all professionals, groups, genres, networks, companies and cities.

As a startup we start with offering two essential products, a free personal page for individuals and network based portal for groups:

The free pages are aimed at professional, which as an personal assistent, collects online content, builds your website and continuously checks those networks for updates, keeping online branding up to date. Fans can easily see all your latest updates. Clients see in one view why they should book you.

Portals connects likeminded professionals in network and present them as a portal. The portal is aimed to support their members to increase their online reach, promote their shared goals. The portal offers a great way to reach and grow new audience. It does some cool tricks as managing an portal based events agenda and a youtubeplayer to start with.

Join us and helps grow into a full service tool assisting all members to become more efficient in digital promotion and branding.

projects.title: HAVINGFUN.at
projects.description:
HAVINGFUN.at is offline at the moment and continued via heythis.is.

Basically the app does the following: It is an online event community/platform based on information by its users. HAVINGFUN.at is the ideal website to check out what events are popular within a country, city, date and genre (upcoming feature). HAVINGFUN.at is based on shared event information within social media. A new user only once grants HAVINGFUN.at access to their profile to make use of their content. This content is gathered by HAVINGFUN.at. Basically that is all there is to it. Now everyone can visit HAVINGFUN.at see all events and have fun.

The first upcoming version will, make a shift to more personalized information regarding events.

projects.title: Tygermom.com
projects.description:
Tygermom is a startup tool that helps it’s users to validate and improve their ideas and concepts. It opens up that blackbox of concept, customers, network, partners and funding. It is the essential part all new projects and businesses have to go trough before actually starting up. Basically it asks some basic marketing input, what is your plan, what are the products, who are the customers, do you need partners, what are your assets, what are the costs and how do you get it funded. Based on this info users indicate how much paying customers, advisors or funding is needed. As this is all set users can start with selling their idea, collecting worthfull informtaion about their product, markt, customers and funding potential. When everything is checked, the project is validated and ready to have a succesfull start. 

The Proof of Concept was solid, but missed an essential part namely visualizing the proces and connecting all gathered info to work toghether. I have worked out the businessmodel expanding the marketingplan with basic questions. I also added the feature that customers can be connected to products, including feedback on the product, which can be used to improve the propesition. For a straightforward product as this is, the sales offer was simplified to payment per live product for a limited period. Final we added a document creator, so the validated project could be send as an pdf to potential stakeholders. As a final I translated this into a complete live prototype, which is ready for devlopment.

Personally I love Tygermom en working on it. I wished I had this tool 15 years ago. It would have helped me tremendously in getting the needed validation to share with the cultural subsidiaries. It is teh perfect tool for prevalidating your project before starting an crowdproject. I think when it is on the market for usage, it will help thousands of people and projects to acheive a succesfull startup.

projects.title: Leanfund.us
projects.description:
Leanfund.us is a platform where business can start a selfhosted project for funding their projects or institutions, accelarators can white label their own platform for their clients. 

It is a different approach to the crowdfundingplatforms where entrpreneurs only get funded if their goal is met within the set period. If you don’t meet your goals with lets says 10 to 20%, you won’t get funded. This harsh because all the effort is wasted and with 80% of the soughtafter funding funded, nearly all projects can start. So for setting up a real business this is counter productive. 99% of setting up a new business is building step by step, concepting, strategizing, growing, refining and so on. This is the vision behind leanfund.us enabling their customers to setup projects and get funding for what they need to startup. From there on they can continue using the leanfund.us untill they have growing into a selfsustaining business.

I supported the team with advice regarding their productstrategy, salesmodels, customersmodels. Toghether we worked on the task how to serve more different type customers with the same technical setup. One mayor improvement was refactoring the code into modules, so leanfund.us could offer:
- A simple widget to be used by individual businesses.
- A out-of-the-box platform for cities, accelerators and large institutions.
- A fully custimizable white label product.
Also by modularizing the code, it is know possible to completely have all the customer service being handled with the tool by the client self. This results in drastic decrease of customers on leanfun’s part for clients that are actually taking their services via a white labled platform.

projects.title: Sparkplug
projects.description: Sparkplug is a initiative to build a platform for upcoming talenten Urban Talents, like musicians and dancers. The focus was on Reggae, Soul/Funk and HipHop. The dutch missed on a specific stage where these artist could perform. We started this with help from Gemeente Den Haag, Fond1818, Prins Bernhard Cultuurfonds, Het Paard van Troje and de Supermarkt.

profile_positions.description:
After finishing my Bachelor in Economics I've turned my focus on new product development en bringing those to market. I started three new cultural projects that were targeted at under-represented cultural groups within the city of The Hague and also within the national cultural field. 

Starting 2010 I have started concepting new products for online consumption, mobile applications for web and native devices. My first project was a application that made sharing pictures easy between unconnected people. My last application is a community app, named heythis.is. For professionals simplifies the task of having all social media content on a personal page, by automated content aggregation. For networks such as cities, businesses, schools and professionalgroups it enables them to build a portalsite with dynamic content overviewpages provided by their members. Think of videowall with all videos shared by their members etc.

In my work the following aspects are present : Concepting, Product Development and Product Marketing, Peoples Management, Acquisition, Administration.
profile_positions.title: Product Developer & Strategic Marketeer

profile_positions.description: Developing new products for individuals to interact with huge Social Networks.
profile_positions.title: Creative Director

profile_positions.description:
As Creative Director my role is to create new products and/or new product features. Within the company I am in charge of the whole process from the concepting to finalized product. The below elements form the essence of my work:

Basic Market Research:
- Market aspects of a product. (Trends, Market Operations, Big Players, Points of Sale etc)
- Revenue streams
- Consumer behavior towards or expectations of a product.

Concepting Phase:
- Vision on how the product will develop based on trends and consumer behavior.
- Concept the product.

Product development:
- Analysing the raw data sets. (My focus is on the available data in large social communities that provide API's to use that data for other purposes)
- Formulating business rules and functions
- The functional design.
- Prototyping the product.
- Formulating the technical aspects of the product.

Project management:
- Building a team.
- Projectmanagement.

Final product ready for marketing and sales!!
profile_positions.title: Entrepreneur

profile_positions.description:
I worked here as freelance business strategist and helped develop the main apps, leanfund.us and tygermom. 

For leanfund.us I have worked on improving the overall strategy, product offer, customers and salesstrategy.

For tygermom I have worked on improving their working prototype into a MVP. I have strategized their product in how it engages with users and how to retain them. Created a simplified salesmodel. Improved viral growth of the app, but I most say Arthur van de Graaf is one of the best salespersons I know, so growing the app is the least of concerns. I finalized the project by building a fully working live prototype, with sales, sharing, login, dashboards, user settings and product feautures. The app is planned to be developed Q2 2019.
